cause.description:
HHGDR is a NO KILL shelter dedicated to saving and placing abused, abandoned, and neglected Great Danes and other dogs in suitable, loving, and forever homes in Ohio, Northern Kentucky, and Eastern Indiana.
HHGDR is dedicated to educating the public on pet over population, the need for spay/neuter, and the pet store/puppy mill connection.
Become a Fan! http://www.new.facebook.com/pages/Bethel-OH/Harlequin-Haven-Great-Dane-Rescue/6251498722
1. Protect homeless, abandoned, and mistreated Great Danes
2. Stop puppy mills and educate on the pet store/puppy mill connection
3. Promote spay/neuter of pets
cause.mission: Protect homeless, abandoned, mistreated Great Danes and other animals. Promote humane principles, spay/neuter and sterilization, health care, nutrition. Locate life-long homes for homeless dogs
cause.name: Harlequin Haven Great Dane Rescue
